title: Ocuvite Products for Eye Health
author: Ami Ishver, PharmD

sections.heading: Ocuvite: A Simple Guide to Eye Vitamins
content: Ocuvite products are vitamin/mineral supplements that may help maintain your eye health, especially as you get older. Taking these vitamins can help support your eyes' natural defenses against damage from sunlight, blue light from screens, and the normal aging process.

content_blocks.text: Ocuvite products are vitamin/mineral supplements that may help maintain your eye health, especially as you get older. Taking these vitamins can help support your eyes' natural defenses against damage from sunlight, blue light from screens, and the normal aging process.

sections.heading: What Are the Key Ingredients and What Do They Do?
content: The Ocuvite products contain a mix of vitamins and minerals. See the table below to learn what each ingredient does.

content_blocks.text: The Ocuvite products contain a mix of vitamins and minerals. See the table below to learn what each ingredient does.

sections.heading: What are the possible side effects of Ocuvite products?
content: Serious allergic reactions are rare, but any medicine can cause an allergic reaction that needs medical help right away. Stop taking the medicine and get medical attention right away if you have any of the following signs of an allergic reaction.

Ocuvite products are generally safe to take. The most common side effects are mild stomach issues, like feeling a little sick or having diarrhea. Taking the supplement with food can often prevent this.
bullets: Swelling of the face, lips, mouth, tongue, or throat

content_blocks.text: Serious allergic reactions are rare, but any medicine can cause an allergic reaction that needs medical help right away. Stop taking the medicine and get medical attention right away if you have any of the following signs of an allergic reaction.
associated_bullets: Swelling of the face, lips, mouth, tongue, or throat

content_blocks.text: Ocuvite products are generally safe to take. The most common side effects are mild stomach issues, like feeling a little sick or having diarrhea. Taking the supplement with food can often prevent this.

sections.heading: What should I know before using Ocuvite products?
content: Ocuvite products come as tablets, soft gel capsules, and gummies. Ocuvite tablets and soft gel capsules should be taken in the morning with a full glass of water during a meal.

content_blocks.text: Ocuvite products come as tablets, soft gel capsules, and gummies. Ocuvite tablets and soft gel capsules should be taken in the morning with a full glass of water during a meal.

content: Never take more than the recommended dose on the package. Too much of certain vitamins and minerals can be harmful.

There may be side effects, additional warnings, and interactions with other medicines that are not listed here. These may vary depending on the combination of ingredients in the specific Ocuvite product you are using. Always check the label before taking any over-the-counter medicine. Do not take more than the recommended dose. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist about your health conditions and other medicines to help determine which products are safe for you.

sections.heading: Which Ocuvite supplement is right for me?
content: Since Ocuvite has different products, use this simple guide to figure out which one might be the best match for your needs. All products are usually taken once a day with food.
Ocuvite Adult 50+
Ocuvite Blue Light
Ocuvite Eye Performance
Ocuvite Eye Health Gummies
Ocuvite Eye Health Formula
bullets: Contains Lutein, Zeaxanthin, Omega-3s, and Vitamins C, E, D, Zinc, and Copper to support aging eyes
Provides high levels of Lutein and Zeaxanthin to help filter and shield your eyes from blue light
Provides a blend of key nutrients plus a high dose of Lutein, Zeaxanthin, and Omega-3s
Chewy gummy with a mixed fruit flavor
Provides essential vitamin, minerals, Lutein, and Zeaxanthin

meta_description: Find which Ocuvite products are right for your eye health and learn about the side effects, safety, interactions, and more.
